CamTCC599.First Lines:
mEn may leue all gamysThat saylen to seynt Iamysffor many a
                    man his gramysWhen they begyn to sayle…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…A man were as good to be dedeAs smell therof þe
                    stynk
